p: In our analyses we used a stable Zika virus E dimer ( S4 Fig) which has a native antigenic structure and displays quaternary, E dimer-specific epitopes ([ 44], S4 Fig). Although more complex quaternary epitopes (generated by the herring-bone-like arrangement of E at the surface of mature viruses) have been identified by cryo EM analyses of Fab-virion complexes (reviewed in [ 18, 19, 66]) we show that corresponding antibodies in our polyclonal sera accounted for a maximum of ~ 10% of total Zika virus NT activity ( S5 Fig).
